description: Non-Material Amendment to planning application ref: P2017/0197/FUL pursuant to the relocation of the cycle parking area and other cycle parking amendments.
decision_conditions:
Amended Condition 2:

DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Drysdale Ground Floor- Scope of Works by LTS Architects Limited dated 27.01.2017, Design and Access Statement by LTSLTS Architects Limited dated 13.01.2017 , Proposed external mechanical equipment by Hoare LEA dated 23/02/2017 Rev2 and Drawing Nos. 00-EX-001 P2, 00-EX-101 P2, 00-EX-103 P1, 01-GA-100 P1, 01-GA-101 P3, 01-GA-102 P3, 01-GA-103 P1, 02-GA-204 P2, 02-GA-203 P2, 02-GA-202 P2, 02-GA-201 P2, 09-GA-902 P2, 05-DE-500 P1, 05-DE-501 P1, 05-DE-503-P1, (90)LP901 Rev 02 and (90)LP902 Rev 02. 
REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
